extendedInfo.description: Best unit price compare / calculator app. Compare unit price of groceries and save money by using Rainbow Compare! Not sure which product saves more? Not a problem, Rainbow Compare to the rescue! Rainbow Compare calculates the unit price and automatically converts it to the same units so that you don't have to! The comparison result is completely visualized together with precise percentage difference so that you can make a more informed, frugal buying decision!Main features:* Visual comparison result* Compare up to 4 products simultaneously* Real-time unit price calculation with optimized precision* Automatic unit conversion. Support up to 34 units, supporting both US, imperial, and S.I units.* Absolutely FREE!More info:http://www.chakdev.comhttp://www.facebook.com/ChakDevelopmenthttp://www.twitter.com/ChakDevelopment----------------------------------------------------------Keywords: grocery, groceries, shopping, save money, savings, money saving, compare, comparison, cheap, cheapest, frugal, frugality, unit price, price, rainbow, rainbow compare, unit conversion, spend less, visual, colorful, calculator

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Made price comparison a lot easier. Very simple to use, which i like.
reviews.author: Katie Hernandez

reviews.title: Needs work..
reviews.comment: Its a good idea and a nice shopping tool.  But needs work on the input display.  It shrinks in size,  when you want to fill the info in.  Making it hard to see it.
reviews.author: Shoshi Meiir

reviews.title: Great App, Simple and Fast
reviews.comment: PRO: This is great to use. Does most units of measure and love the way it brings up the one that is the best buy with % difference in savings.  I noticed you can now tap  and place an  item name for each item so you do not forget which was item A or B. Simple and fast. It would be nice if there was a way that you could say compare buying (2) 12 oz cans on something at $1.68 a can if you were to buy 2 smaller cans, against say a 24 oz can. But hey, it works wonderful and  saves the brain drain at the grocers.
reviews.author: Ted W

reviews.title: Amazing tool!
reviews.comment: Only request would be PLEASE allow more than 4 items to be compared. why limit the user?  Other than that perfect !
reviews.author: cj juszczak

reviews.title: Really helpful
reviews.comment: Great for comparing different sizes to figure out best deal
reviews.author: Alexa D

reviews.title: Close to Perfect
reviews.comment: For the current product it still 5 stars. It can be better if we can change the currency unit from $. It should be better if we can see the 2.3.4 ranking and % because sometime we do not select the first one because of some reason. The lower ranking should have more information for better decision.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not bad
reviews.comment: As a developer, I appreciate the effort you put into this app. It\'s very handy too! I recommend using a shopping API so users can search for products without having to put all the information in. Regardless, very good app. Five stars from me.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Don\'t shop without it!
reviews.comment: $ Pints to $ liters - simple. Keeps track if liquid or dry goods.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: improve more
reviews.comment: u can allow user to enter the name of the product (shop\'s name) when we are comparing products because we usually compare price among different shops, product \'A,B, C\' might be confused. and it\'s more user-friendly  if we could insert the number by tapping n select numerical character than scroll. +1 for the attractive colors,I love it!suits the name well!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I\'m the developer of this app
reviews.comment: And I wholeheartedly recommend this app to you.  When Rainbow Compare was first released, I could only give it a 4-star rating.  The early versions of Rainbow Compare took too much focus away from the main task which is to find out which grocery product saves the most money. Even I refrained from using it at times.  That had fundamentally changed from version 1.4 onward.   Now I use it every time I go for grocery shopping. It is intuitive and informative. Rainbow Compare blends really well into the grocery shopping process. Now we can focus on our real task -- grocery shopping.
reviews.author: A Google User
